issara naya gaththe mudal amathyanshaya, dan eka eka amathyansha witharak nemeyi, kuda aayathana pawa naya gannawa.
6 sathurange nagara sunu wisunu kara atha.
ebawin niwan awabodhaya pinisa daham desana budurajunge deshanawa igena ganna shrawakayan wisin ee sandaha upayuktha paryeshana simawa awabodha kara ganima athyawashya ya.

ninda madi unama mathaka saila miya yanawa. 7-nindedi hisa aawaranaya kara ganima oyath samahara wita oluwe indala porawagena nidaganna purudu wela athi.meya ithamath narakayi.mokada ee nisa nindedi api prashwasa karana kaban dayoksayid wayuwama ayeth aashwasa kerenawa.ethakota molayata awashya tharam oksijan nolabi yama nisa molayata hani wenawa. 8-asanipayen sitina wita molaya wehesa kirima asanipa awastha wala padam kirima,molaya wehesawa wada kirima nisa molaye karyakshama bawa adu wenawa wagema hani sidu wennath puluwan. 9-prabodhamath sithiwili adu wima honda sithiwili molaya puhunu karawanna hondama kramayayi.nitharama kala kerunu runathmaka sithiwili walin sitima nisa molaye kriyashilithwaya aduwenawa 10-aduwen sithima yanthrayak wunath hondin wada karanne eyin wada ganna kotayi.molayath ee wage.

kawuru karath warada waradamayi mama muslim ee wunath machan mama ehema thanaka hitiyanam hamuduruwongen prasiddhawa ahanawa oowa buddhagame uganwanne na neda ayi ohoma minissu athare wairaya wapuranne kiyala.
